SEARCH
Package DAOs

Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
DAOs.DAO
DAOs.GameDAO
public class GameDAO extends DAO
This class represents a Data Access Object (DAO) for Game objects. It extends the DAO class and provides methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting Game objects from a data source.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private HashMap<String,Game>
    games
    A map of all Game objects in the DAO, with the gameID as the key.

  • Method Details

    • addGame

      public void addGame(Game game) throws DataAccessException
      Adds a Game object to the DAO's HashMap.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object to add
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the data or the gameID already exists

    • getGame

      public Game getGame(String gameID) throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves a Game object from the DAO's HashMap by name.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the GameID of the Game object to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Game object with the specified ID, or null if it does not exist
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the data or the game does not exist

    • getAllGames

      public HashSet<Game> getAllGames() throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves all Game objects from the DAO's HashMap.
      Returns:
      a HashSet containing all Game objects in the DAO's HashMap
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the data

    • updateGame

      public Game updateGame(Game game) throws DataAccessException
      Updates a Game object in the DAO's HashMap.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object to update
      Returns:
      the updated Game object
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the data or the game does not already exist

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all Game objects from the DAO's HashMap. Never throws.

    • deleteGame

      public void deleteGame(Game game) throws DataAccessException
      Deletes a Game object from the DAO's HashMap.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object to delete
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the data or the game does not exist
